body:
Comment 1: 
This is a problem with SSL in general - you can't have two-level wildcards. The https
form of those URLs is deprecated. You're supposed to be able to use code.google.com for
everything, but apparently not for getting raw files. This is a bug in code.google.com.
I filed http://code.google.com/p/support/issues/detail?id=28747 for this.
_Status changed to **Unfortunate**._
